content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: I am willing to rent the apartment for 600 Euros per month. What do you say?
name: Max Müller

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month for the apartment.

content: Hi Mister Muller, I have a better offer for you. I am willing to rent the apartment for 550 Euros per month. What do you say?
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Muller. I am willing to rent the apartment for 550 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month.
